author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes a couple of mistakes in the HTCodor configuration for the submission of Tracker Alignment Split Vertex Validation jobs with the  `submitPVResolutionJobs.py` script. A couple of monitoring histograms are also fixed.

#### PR validation:

Validated privately (need to submit HTCondor jobs)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport and no backport is needed.
title: miscellaneous fixes for Split Vertex Validation submitter
